entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
So trump is now trying to trick networks into covering him, saying it’s about coronavirus, and then walks out into the Rose Garden at the White House and starts a campaign rally on Joe Biden, that’s bullshit. I hate this MF’er w the power of a thousand suns. 

140k dead Americans
